attributes.action: Stop Local Authorities  giving themselves permission to delete Green belt.
attributes.background: Stop Local Authority excessive aspiration for housing above the proposed DCLG standardised housing requirement, from deleting Green Belt or Green Field by giving themselves permission, or contrary to Neighbourhood plans. Excessive housing creates the very special circumstances and not independent.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
